main event: A civilian observed a single unidentified flying object over Lake Charles, Louisiana for 2-3 minutes on October 13, 1967.
interesting points: The object appeared solid and was brighter than the brightest stars.
The object appeared to stand still at times and suddenly speed up and rush away.
The object changed brightness and flashed or flickered.
The object disappeared and reappeared during the sighting.
There were no photographs taken of the object.
